definition: to prophesy with supernatural accuracy (idiom)/to have an incredible foresight
material/stuff/grain/feed/to expect/to anticipate/to guess
matter/thing/item/work/affair/CL:件[jian4],樁|桩[zhuang1],回[hui2]
as/as if/such as
God/abbr. for 神舟[Shen2 zhou1]
deity/soul/spirit/unusual/mysterious/lively/expressive/expression/look/CL:個|个[ge4]/(slang) awesome/amazing

sentences.english: Since I cannot foretell things like a prophet, I cannot help taking a small loss.
sentences.chinese: 我又不能料事如神，總不免要喫點小虧。

sentences.english: The child's father appreciated Fan Wenfu for the help, and praised him of foretelling things accurately.
sentences.chinese: 費父聽完後感激範文甫的救命之恩，稱讚他料事如神。

definition: divine strategy and wonderful planning (idiom)/clever scheme/supremely clever in his schemes
predictable/sth one can predict without being a clairvoyant
resourceful/full of stratagems
to lead military operations with extraordinary skill
lit. deep plans and distant thoughts/to plan far ahead (idiom)
highly intelligent (idiom)
to possess great magical power/to possess remarkable abilities
rigorous schemes and deep foresight (idiom); astute and circumspect
lit. to devise battle plan in a tent (idiom)/fig. planning strategies
extremely bright (idiom)
wise/brilliant
deceitful in many ways (idiom); wily and mischievous/full of craft and cunning
even the wisest can have a momentary lapse in judgment (idiom)/every man has a fool in his sleeve
pinyin: cong1 ming5 yi1 shi4 , hu2 tu5 yi1 shi2

definition: wise and resolute
clear as a flame (idiom); to see things absolutely clearly
resourceful/intelligent
